name: Richard Watsham
background: Richard Watsham serves as Director of Commissioning at UKTV (BBC Studios). Focus areas include overall commissioning strategy across UKTV channels, tailored factual programming, and returnable formats.
thematic_priorities: Channel-tailored factual; returnable formats with commercial potential
Strong focus on presenter-led factual with established talent
History docs with broad appeal and narrative storytelling
True crime documentaries with mystery/investigation elements
format_specifications: Series (6–10 episodes) with potential to return
Primetime scheduling where applicable; platform premieres for streamers
budget_parameters: Documentary: £80K–£180K per hour; Specialist Factual: £80K–£180K per hour
technical_requirements: Broadcast/streaming standards; details provided upon commissioning
Subtitles/captions; audio description per broadcaster requirements
current_calls: Reflect latest broadcaster priorities outlined in the commissioning brief
submission_process: One-page outline with premise, format and target audience
Commercial partnerships or brand integration potential
additional_info: Submissions accepted year-round; emphasis on distinctive voices and cross-platform reach.
